definitions.definition: An uneven shape or mess created by something dispersing on impact.
examples: He had a hard time cleaning up the paint splatters on the carpet.

definitions.definition: Spurious emissions resulting from an abrupt change in a transmitted radio signal .

main_definition: An uneven shape or mess created by something dispersing on impact.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , attributive ) A genre of gory horror .
( uncountable , radio ) Spurious emissions resulting from an abrupt change in a transmitted radio signal .
